name: Play Soccer 2020 - Real Match
description:
Play Soccer 2020 is eleven player 3d soccer simulation game. Game is crafted carefully to bring real soccer joy to this simulation. This game will not only let you play with opponent teams but help you in perfecting your soccer skills. Take control of your player and do some super goals against your opponents.

Game contains 20+ top soccer playing nations. Select your favorite team, lead them in Tournament/Knockout competitions, Compete and WIN. Share your achievements with Facebook Friends.

We have integrated global leaderboard in this simulation game. You can compete the players all around he world. Win big matches and keep your level on the top of the list.

ADVANCE GRAPHICS, ANIMATIONS AND SOUNDS FEATURES:
Now play the modernized realistic art 3D graphics for unique know-how of soccer world cup in present-day conduct on your smart phone as you use to play. Fully drafted animations to preserve you in real touch of world cup to enjoy the aroma of Russia world cup at your home, different stadiums and fields preferences, free hits, kicks, hand ball, head shoots, penalty kicks animations and all the such features and sound effects will evolve you in your own world of football associated to team captain, play and exercise the strategies, lineup tactics to win the leagues.

BUILD AND MANAGE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM:
Frame your invincible squad and prefer your 11 team players battalion from several countries and uniforms distinctions. Train them outstanding to contest against super star teams around the globe. Create best attackers, midfielders, defenders and goalkeeper. Manage your team line up, instantly tease tactics in each match. Make the honorable calls to your team at club practice and push your team to the legendary famed status.
